file.name: Use toUTCString() to convert today's date (according to UTC) to a string.html
Use setFullYear() to set a specific date.html
Use round() to round a number.html
Use random() to return a random number between 0 and 1.html
Use min() to return the number with the lowest value of two specified numbers.html
Use max() to return the number with the highest value of two specified numbers.html
Use getTime() to calculate the years since 1970.html
Use getDay() and an array to write a weekday, and not just a number.html
Use Date() to return today's date and time.html
Style strings.html
Sort numbers (numerically and descending) - sort().html
Sort numbers (numerically and ascending) - sort().html
Sort an array (alphabetically and ascending) - sort().html
Select elements from an array - slice().html
Search for a text in a string and return the text if found - match().html
Reverse the order of the elements in an array - reverse().html
Return the position of the first occurrence of a text in a string - indexOf().html
Return the length of a string.html
Replace characters in a string - replace().html
Remove the last element of an array - pop().html
Remove the first element of an array - shift().html
Join two arrays - concat().html
Join three arrays - concat().html
Join all elements of an array into a string - join().html

Create an array.html
Convert Celsius to Fahrenheit.html
Convert an array to a string - toString().html
Check Boolean value.html
Add new elements to the end of an array - push().html
